hymn.title: How good is the Lord we adore

layout.singingstanza: How good is the Lord we a -- dore, Our faith -- ful, un -- chang -- ea -- ble Friend; His love is as great as His pow'r And knows nei -- ther mea -- sure nor end.

lyrics.stanza: How good is the Lord we adore, Our faithful, unchangeable Friend; His love is as great as His pow'r And knows neither measure nor end.
'Tis Jesus the first and the last, Who shall guide us through all to the throne; We'll praise Him for all that is past, We'll trust Him for all that's to come.
